8175e993.name: Nova
8175e993.description: A rebellious android seeking freedom in a neon-lit dystopia
8175e993.visual_description: Sleek chrome body, glowing blue eyes, asymmetric haircut with purple highlights

b0a07941.name: The Architect
b0a07941.description: An elderly human who designed the android uprising
b0a07941.visual_description: Weathered face, white beard, cybernetic left eye, worn lab coat
